verses.text: Man aye nyiŋ awobe pa Icrael ma yam gubino i Ejipt kacel ki Yakobo, kun ŋat
Ento likwayo pa Icrael gunya gumedde mapol; gunya, gudoko matek twatwal, ci
Ka kabaka manyen oloyo Ejipt, ma yam pe ŋeyo Yucepu,
Wubin wek watimugi ki ryeko, wek pe gunya twatwal; pien ka mony bipoto i
Parao dok ociko lwakke ducu ni, “Latin laco acel acel ma jo Ibru gunywalo
Dako-nu ogamo ic, ci onywalo latin laco. Ka dako oneno ni latinne ber twatwal,
Ka doŋ latin odoŋo, ci otere bot nya pa Parao, odoko wode ocako nyiŋe Moses
Ka Moses doŋ odoŋo, ci i niŋo mo acel en owoto bot lutugi, oneno pekogi. Ka
Ka Parao owinyo lok man, ci omito neko Moses. Ento Moses oriŋo olwi woko ki
Ka Lubaŋa owinyo cur megi, ci opo pi gicikkene ki Abraim ki Icaka, ki Yakobo.
Lamalaika pa Rwot onen bote i leb mac ma i dye caka; oneno caka tye ka lyel
Moses owaco bot Lubaŋa ni, “Ka acito bot jo Icrael, awaco botgi ni, ‘Lubaŋa pa
Ci Lubaŋa owaco ki Moses ni, “ATYE MA ATYE.” Ka dok owacci, “Wac lok man
Dok abimiyo jo man ginoŋo gum i nyim jo Ejipt, wek ka wubicito, pe wucit ki
ci awacci ni, Wek latinna ocit ka tic bota; ka ikwero kome ni pe ociti, nen,
Lubaŋa owaco bot Moses ni, “An a Rwot.
Man aye nyiŋ litino awo be pa Levi, kun lubo yalwakgi: Gercon, Kokat ki
Ento abijiŋo cwiny Parao doko nwaŋ, abimedo lwak lanyut ki taŋo i lobo Ejipt.
Ci Rwot doŋ owaco kuman ni, Pi lok man bimiyo iŋeyo ni an a Rwot: nen,
Ci guwaco bot Parao ni, “Man lwet cin Lubaŋa.” Ento cwiny Parao obedo nwaŋ,
Ci bonyo ocorre i lobo Ejipt ducu, ci obuto, ori i lobo ducu me Ejipt, lwak bonyo
Ci Moses oryeyo ciŋe malo tuŋ polo, ci piny ocido woko matek licuc ma oromo
Rwot owaco bot Moses Aron ki i lobo Ejipt ni,
“Nino man bibedo nino me poyo pe wiwu ma wubigwoko me bedo nino madit
pien Rwot bikato cito ka neko jo Ejipt. Ka en bineno remo i kom rii doggola, ki i
I cwiny dyewor, Rwot oneko litino kayo ducu ma i lobo Ejipt: okwoŋo ki i kom
Jo Icrael gutiyo kit macalo nene Moses ocikogi, gubedo ka lego atego ryal ki
Kare ma jo Icrael gubedo kwede i Ejipt oromo mwaka miya aŋwen ki pyeradek.
Wubicamo ki i ot acel; pe wubikato ki riŋo mo woko nia ki i ot, cogone bene pe
“Kwer litino kayo ducu gubed mega; gin ducu ma okwoŋo yabo ic i kin jo Icrael,
wubi yeko litino ducu mukwoŋo yabo ic gubed pa Rwot. Litino kayo pa limwu
Moses okwanyo cogo pa Yucepu ocito kwede; pien yam Yucepu omiyo jo Icrael
Jo Icrael guwot o i dye nam i lobo mutwe, pii otiŋŋe odoko kicika yo tuŋ ciŋgi
Moses ki jo Icrael guwero wer man bot Rwot kun giwaci ni, “Abiwero wer bot
Rwot aye tekka ma akoro ki wer, en odoko Lalarra. Man aye Lubaŋana, abipako
Rwot dok owaco bot Moses ni, “Nen, abicwalo kwon cwer botwu nia ki i polo; ci
Ka jo Icrael guneno, ci guloko kekengi ni, “Man gin aŋo?” Pien yam peya guniaŋ
Ento ka guporo ki agwata moko kwon, ci ŋat ma ocoko madwoŋ pe mo odoŋ
en owaco botgi ni, “Rwot yam ociko kit man ni, ‘Diki en aye nino me yweyo
I kare meno jo me ot pa Icrael gulwoŋo nyiŋe ni manna. Onoŋo nen macalo
Jo Icrael gucamo manna gutyeko kwede mwaka pyeraŋwen kulu, nio ka guo i
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Co lok man i buk obed me lapo wic, ci ikwan i it
Onoŋo Yecero, won dako pa Moses, ogamo Jipola dako pa Moses, i kare ma
kacel ki awobene aryo. Nyiŋ awobi acel Gercom, pien yam owacci, “Abedo
Pienno ka wubiworo doga, kun wumako gicikkena, ci wubibedo jona kikome i
Wubibedo ker ma lwakke ajwagi ma an aye aloyo, wubibedo rok maleŋ.’ Meno
In ibitoŋo waŋaco me poko ka ma lwak bicuŋ iye, kun itito ki lwak ni,
I kom nino me adekke odiko piny obedo ka mor ma noŋo lutkot wil awila, pol
“Pe iti cal apayani mo, nyo cal gin ma tye malo i polo, nyo ma tye piny i wi lobo,
Pe iryebbe piny i nyimgi, pe iworgi; pien an aye a Rwot Lubaŋani, an Lubaŋa ma
“Pe ilwoŋ nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋani me noŋo; pien Rwot bimiyo kop loyo dano ma
“Po pi nino me cabit, ikwer obed maleŋ.
Ibitic matek nino abicel, kun itiyo iye ticci ducu;
pien i nino abicel aye Rwot yam otiyo iye polo ki nam ki jami ducu ma tye iye,
“Wor woru ki meni, wek iri pi kare malac i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋani bimiyo boti.
“Pe ineki.
“Pe itim abor.
“Pe ikwal gin mo.
“Pe ibed caden me goba i kom lawoti.
“Cwinyi pe opukke i kom ot pa lawoti; cwinyi pe opukke i kom dako pa lawoti,
I kare meno ka dano guneno piny mor ki lutkot ma bedo ka wil awila, ki dwan
Ka ibitiyo keno tyerra ki got, pe ican ki got ma gipayo; pien ka iketo iye giticci
Ka iwilo opii ma en Laibru, en bitic boti pi mwaka abicel i mwaka me abirone
“Ka ŋatti mo ogoyo dano, ce oto, gibineke wako.
Ento ka yam pe obuto okiye, ento Lubaŋa omiyo ciŋe orwatte i kome, ci
“Ka ŋatti mo ekwalo dano, kadi ka ocato bot ŋatti mo nyo ginoŋo bote, gibineke
“Ka ŋatti mo oceno wonne nyo minne gibineke woko.
waŋ ki waŋ, lak ki lak, ciŋ ki ciŋ tyen ki tyen,
“Ka ŋatti mo obito nyako mo ma peya oŋeyo co, ma pe gitoŋo keny i kome, ce
“Pe iwek dako ma latal obed makwo.
“Ŋat ma obuto ki lee ce ginek woko.
“Ŋat ma otumo gitum bot lubaŋa mo, ma pe bot Rwot, gibidyere woko me
“Pe itim labedo ma bedo i kinwu marac, nyo pe iune bene, pien yam wun bene
“Ka imiyo danona mo ma bedo i kinwu omako limmi ma en lacan, pe ibed
“Pe iyet Lubaŋa, nyo pe icen ladit ma loyo wun lwak.
“Wubibedo jo maleŋ ma gikwerogi pira: pienno pe wucam riŋo ma ŋuu
“Pe irwe lok ma iwinyo awinya ata; pe iribbe ki dano marac ka kelo lok goba me
kadi dworo kor lacan i pidone.
“Ka irwatte ki twon pa lamoneni, nyo kanane, ma orwenyo, dwok bote.
“Pe ibal te pido pa danoni ma lacan wek lok oloye.
“Pe iun larok ma bedo i kinwu, pien wun bene wuŋeyo cwiny lubedo, pien wun
“Ibicoyo potoni ci icoko cam ma ocek iye pi mwaka abicel.
“Ti ticci nino abicel, ento i kom nino me abirone ibiywe, wek twon ki kanani
Ibikwc ronino madito me wi mwaka, pic: mukwoŋo cek pi tic me ciŋi, i kom
“Cam mukwoŋo cek i potoni me wi mwaka myero ikel i ot pa Rwot Lubaŋani.
Ka Moses dok otiŋo remo, ocoro i kom lwak, kun wacci, “Nen remo me gicikke
Ka Moses odonyo i dye pol, ocito malo i wi got; ci Moses obedo i wi got nino
Dok ibitiyo kom mekica ki jabu ma giliyo maber; borre obed futi aŋwen, ki
Ibicano mugati me aketa i nyima i wi meja jwijwi.
Dok ber inen ni itimogi i kit cal ma gibenyutti ki i wi got-ti.
Ŋab boŋo kicika ki jarara lagolle. Kel canduk lok me caden kunnu ki i boŋo
I kicaa kor me ŋolo kop ibiketo iye Urim ki Tumim ; gin bene gibibedo i pal
ibiwaŋo riŋo nyok romo woko ducu ki berre i wi keno tyer; en aye gitum
Dano acel acel ka ikwano welle bimiyo gin man: nucu cekel me kabedo maleŋ
“Dok ibitiyo otako mola, ki tedi tere bene me mola, obed me lwok. Ibicibo cuŋ i
Dok Rwot omedde owaco bot Moses ni,
Wubitiyo tic nino abicel, ento nino me abiro en aye cabit me yweyo mot, nino
En aye lanyut matwal i kin an ki jo Icrael, ni, Rwot yam otiyo polo ki lobo nino
Ka lwak guneno ni Moses doŋ ori, pe dwogo piny ki i wi got, ci gucokke gugurre
En ogamo jabu ki i ciŋgi, ci oteto ki nyol me liŋo kome, ci otimo cal wod twon
Ci gua malo odiko con, gutyero gitum awaŋa mapol, ka gukelo tyergi me
Ento Moses obako doge bot Rwot Lubaŋane kun waco ni, “Ai Rwot, piŋo akemo
Po i kom Abraim, Icaka ki Icrael luticci, ma yam in kikomi aye, ikwonne ki nyiŋi
Ento koni, ka ibitimogi kica i kom balgi, ci timgi; nyo ka pe, ci alegi ni, ijwa
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Wua woko ki kany, in ki lwak ducu ma yam
Rwot ogamo ni, “Abimiyo berra ducu kato ki i nyimi, ka dok abituco nyina ni, ‘A
Rwot okato ki i nyime kun tucce ni, “Rwot, Rwot, Lubaŋa ma lakica dok maro
Ento wumuk keno jogigi woko, wuret wir jogigi piny, wutoŋ yadi ma gipito ka
“Pe iti cal lubaŋa mo me nyonyo aliya piri keni.
“Ibikwero nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye, Ibicamo mugati ma tobi pe
“Litino kayo ducu mega, litino twonini, litino kayo me dyaŋi ki me romi.
Latin kayo pa kana ibikoko ki latin nyok romo, nyo ka pe ikoko, ci itur ŋute
“Ibitic nino abicel, ento i nino me abiro ibiywe iye; wa i kare me pur ki i kare
Ibibedo ki nino madit me kwero agikki cabit abiro, en aye wi mwaka me kayo
“Pe ityer remo me gitumma kacel ki tobi; pe giwek gitum me nino madit me
“Cam mukwoŋo cek i potoni me wi mwaka myero ikel i ot pa Rwot Lubaŋani.
Ka lacen Moses olor piny ki i wi got Cinai, ma omako kidi ma apada aryo me lok
Wuti tic nino abicel, ento i nino me abirone wubed ki cabit maleŋ me yweyo
Otiyo moo maleŋ me wir bene, ki odok eceta ma ŋwece kur ma giliyo maber,
Ki ryal ma oa ki bot lwak ma gikwano onoŋo pekke romo talanta miya acel ki
Onoŋo dano acel acel okelo beka acel, (en aye nucu cekel me kabedo maleŋ), pi
Lacen pol obino, oumo wi kema me rwatte woko, ci deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i
